p: Standard solution preparation: 1) 5 mg·mL − 1 triundecanoin (C11) internal standard solution: 0.5 g triundecanoin (C11) was added to a beaker and dissolved by the addition of methanol. Then, the solution was transferred into a volumetric flask and increased to a 100-mL constant volume with methanol. 2) Mixed standard solution of 37-component fatty acid methyl: 100 μL of the 37-component fatty acid methyl mixture was added to a 10-mL volumetric flask and increased to a constant volume with n-hexane. The two standard solutions were stored in a − 4 °C refrigerator.
